author: jhardin
msg: Tweak lotsa_money, throw out a bad rule

author: rgardler
msg: Now that we've switched to using the connector framework we no longer have anonymous users for widgets. This means the two widgets are actually owned by the same user, so put a note on the page to this effect until it is resolved.

author: rgardler
msg: Use the connector framework to manage instances. This means we are testing the connector framework in Wookie itself.

author: rgardler
msg: Implement a WookieConnectorService for use within Wookie itself.
This required some refactoring of the connector framework:
- Remove unused instance collection from Widget class
- move parsing of XML widget instance description to connector service
- allow retrieval/creation of a widget using GUID
